<MembersIndexItem
  type="class"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/threadsafecontext">ThreadSafeContext</a></>}>
An <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/llvmcontext">LLVMContext</a> together with an associated mutex that can be used to lock the context to prevent concurrent access by other threads. <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/threadsafecontext/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

  type="struct"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/orc/threadsafecontext/state">State</a></>}>

</MembersIndexItem>

  type="class"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/threadsafemodule">ThreadSafeModule</a></>}>
An LLVM <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/module">Module</a> together with a shared <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/threadsafecontext">ThreadSafeContext</a>. <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/threadsafemodule/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

</MembersIndex>

<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/threadsafemodule/#a1bba70015bd06fc62083890136957dda"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/threadsafemodule/#a5238e1d80536030a7ddd0a00e18c7371">ThreadSafeModule</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/threadsafemodule/#a1bba70015bd06fc62083890136957dda">operator=</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/threadsafemodule/#a5238e1d80536030a7ddd0a00e18c7371">ThreadSafeModule</a> &amp;&amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9eb4f5b98b70ee4fab9614ed58282c1fa6311ae17c1ee52b36e68aaf4ad066387">Other</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We have to explicitly define this move operator to copy the fields in</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// reverse order (i.e. module first) to ensure the dependencies are</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// protected: The old module that is being overwritten must be destroyed</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// &#42;before&#42; the context that it depends on.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We also need to lock the context to make sure the module tear-down</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// does not overlap any other work on the context.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (M) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><Highlight kind="normal">      M = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><Highlight kind="normal">    M = std::move(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9eb4f5b98b70ee4fab9614ed58282c1fa6311ae17c1ee52b36e68aaf4ad066387">Other</a>.M);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><Highlight kind="normal">    TSCtx = std::move(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9eb4f5b98b70ee4fab9614ed58282c1fa6311ae17c1ee52b36e68aaf4ad066387">Other</a>.TSCtx);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Construct a ThreadSafeModule from a unique&#95;ptr&lt;Module&gt; and a</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// unique&#95;ptr&lt;LLVMContext&gt;. This creates a new ThreadSafeContext from the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// given context.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/threadsafemodule/#a59b16a2ba2778523a92d88a10d000e9d"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/threadsafemodule/#a59b16a2ba2778523a92d88a10d000e9d">ThreadSafeModule</a>(std::unique&#95;ptr&lt;Module&gt; M, std::unique&#95;ptr&lt;LLVMContext&gt; Ctx)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><Highlight kind="normal">      : M(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/std">std</a>::<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#abfc9c7ecf70f66901e439f7c04ef3dbb">move</a>(M)), TSCtx(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/std">std</a>::<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#abfc9c7ecf70f66901e439f7c04ef3dbb">move</a>(Ctx)) &#123;&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Construct a ThreadSafeModule from a unique&#95;ptr&lt;Module&gt; and an</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// existing ThreadSafeContext.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/threadsafemodule/#aad76bc6379e9faa0a0b2e360817bbc37"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/threadsafemodule/#aad76bc6379e9faa0a0b2e360817bbc37">ThreadSafeModule</a>(std::unique&#95;ptr&lt;Module&gt; M, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/threadsafecontext">ThreadSafeContext</a> TSCtx)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><Highlight kind="normal">      : M(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/std">std</a>::<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#abfc9c7ecf70f66901e439f7c04ef3dbb">move</a>(M)), TSCtx(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/std">std</a>::<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#abfc9c7ecf70f66901e439f7c04ef3dbb">move</a>(TSCtx)) &#123;&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/threadsafemodule/#a39fded867bd4a9aa23197880a2523bdb"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/threadsafemodule/#a39fded867bd4a9aa23197880a2523bdb">~ThreadSafeModule</a>() &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We need to lock the context while we destruct the module.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (M) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> L = TSCtx.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/threadsafecontext/#a25f49da8596355b9e4d0f2f85b792854">getLock</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><Highlight kind="normal">      M = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Boolean conversion: This ThreadSafeModule will evaluate to true if it</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// wraps a non-null module.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/threadsafemodule/#ad047604d783d265d6f5a5cfc3f0345e3"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">explicit</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">operator</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> bool()</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (M) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(TSCtx.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/threadsafecontext/#a26cd7d5082cf17b4782dc90afbc37899">getContext</a>() &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><Highlight kind="normal">             </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Non-null module must have non-null context&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Locks the associated ThreadSafeContext and calls the given function</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// on the contained Module.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/threadsafemodule/#a5dc53e9bbda9066a1ade839494fe0cd9"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">template</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">typename</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Func&gt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">decltype</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">) <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/threadsafemodule/#a5dc53e9bbda9066a1ade839494fe0cd9">withModuleDo</a>(Func &amp;&amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(M &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Can not call on null module&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Lock = TSCtx.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/threadsafecontext/#a25f49da8596355b9e4d0f2f85b792854">getLock</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>(&#42;M);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Locks the associated ThreadSafeContext and calls the given function</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// on the contained Module.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/threadsafemodule/#aa62be2ea900c7dbd8c0d45af767142c5"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">template</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">typename</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Func&gt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">decltype</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">) <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/threadsafemodule/#aa62be2ea900c7dbd8c0d45af767142c5">withModuleDo</a>(Func &amp;&amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>) </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Locks the associated ThreadSafeContext and calls the given function,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// passing the contained std::unique&#95;ptr&lt;Module&gt;. The given function should</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// consume the Module.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/threadsafemodule/#a0f1e21cac5addd85d48c5e4819d31df7"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">template</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">typename</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Func&gt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">decltype</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">) <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/threadsafemodule/#a0f1e21cac5addd85d48c5e4819d31df7">consumingModuleDo</a>(Func &amp;&amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>(std::move(M));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
